author: Slidebean
description:
OpenAI launches Group Chat positioning ChatGPT as a workplace platform.

OpenAI’s new Group Chat feature allows up to 20 users to collaborate directly within a single prompt thread.

Beyond convenience, it signals a deeper shift: a bid to move team discussions and workflows away from existing tools like Slack and Microsoft Teams.

By testing first in Japan and Taiwan, OpenAI is refining its security posture before scaling globally.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: ChatGPT just turned into a group project
